p.a: Dunham Elementary School provides a rigorous academic program and wide range of enrichment classes in an intimate, family oriented environment.

div.p: Staff specialists in drama, music, physical education, and garden provide programs to all our students, TK through Sixth Grade.

p.a: Dunham Parent Teacher Organization invites parents to get involved and make a difference! Volunteering is always appreciated!

p.a: See why Dunham is loved by so many!

vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey vc_custom_1489152994787 vc_custom_1489152994787

div.p: Top notch academic instruction combined with enrichment opportunities.
World-class education in a beautiful rural wine country setting.
100% of our staff are highly qualified and appropriately placed.
2nd - 6th grade students learn 21st century technology skills.
Please click the button below to fill out our school information form and a representative of the school will contact you asap.

Accessibility Notice: Dunham Elementary is committed to ensuring that its website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. If you experience difficulty accessing any content on this website, please contact webmaster Dan Bowen at itadmin@dunhamsd.org or 707-795-5050 to request the information in an alternative format, or to provide feedback on how Dunham can improve its website accessibility.
